layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x90
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x90
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x66
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 172x19
          text run at (0,0) width 172: "COLGROUP WIDTH=px"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,36) size 608x30 [border: (1px outset #808080)]

          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0

          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 606x24
